items.title: Original burger
items.description: For real meatlovers! The Big Burger comes with our thickest patty, we recommend getting it medium grilled with a pink center so you can feel the flavor of our carefully selected fresh beef.

items.title: Hipster
items.description: For real meatlovers! The Big Burger comes with our thickest patty, we recommend getting it medium grilled with a pink center so you can feel the flavor of our carefully selected fresh beef.

items.title: Monster
items.description: For real meatlovers! The Big Burger comes with our thickest patty, we recommend getting it medium grilled with a pink center so you can feel the flavor of our carefully selected fresh beef.

items.title: Cheese
items.description: If you choose this size we recommend that you add an extra patty and you will get a delicious double burger. Add double Cheddar and you will get a Double Double which might be one of the best combos.
